description: Yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, he focuses on bringing people together around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work explores the evolution of 'ecosystem' from biology to metaphor, introducing 'ecosystem architecture' as a new approach to designing modern, decentralized organizations. Yeehaa emphasizes innovation as a practice, fostering creativity and collaboration to address complex challenges and build resilient, harmonious ecosystems. His courses cover topics like strategic thinking, tactical action, and unconventional tool use to cultivate a mindset conducive to breakthrough ideas and creative problem-solving.
